import React from "react"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import "./CartDetails.css"; const CartDetails = () => { const { items } = useSelector((state) => state.cart); console.log(items); return ( <> {items.length === 0 &&

You Cart is empty

} {items.length > 0 && (

Your Cart : {items.length} {items.length === 1 ? "Item" : "Items"}

{items.map((item) => ( <>

{item.name}

 {item.price}

- +
))}

Order Summary

{/* Display subtotal */}

Subtotal: {cartItems.reduce( (acc, item) => acc + Number(item.quantity), 0 )} (Units)

{/* Display Total */}

Total: {cartItems .reduce( (acc, item) => acc + item.quantity * item.price, 0 ) .toFixed(2)}

{/* Checkout Button */}
;
)} ); }; export default CartDetails; <> {items.length === 0 &&

Your Cart is empty

} {items.length > 0 && ( <>

Your Cart: {items.length} items

{/* cart Items */}
{items.map((item) => ( <>
{item.name}

{item.price}

- +
))}
)} ;
